title: Hotspot- connected, no internet
content:
Setup hotspot, but get "connected, no internet" message. I have tried connecting different devices, same issue.

I have tried resetting network settings, adding "dun" to APN, forgetting the device etc. No luck.

Tethering via USB and bluetooth also gives same message. Carrier does allow hotspots and had I had no troubles setting up with my prior phone.

Please help me get this fixed.
